scripts.reset-cache: rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* $TMPDIR/haste-map-* 2>/dev/null; watchman watch-del-all 2>/dev/null; npx expo start --clear
scripts.android: env -u CI sh -c 'REACT_NATIVE_PACKAGER_HOSTNAME=10.0.2.2 npx expo start --clear & sleep 12 && REACT_NATIVE_PACKAGER_HOSTNAME=10.0.2.2 npx expo run:android --no-bundler; wait'
scripts.android:emulator: JAVA_HOME="/Applications/Android Studio.app/Contents/jbr/Contents/Home" ANDROID_HOME="$HOME/Library/Android/sdk" REACT_NATIVE_PACKAGER_HOSTNAME=10.0.2.2 PATH="/Applications/Android Studio.app/Contents/jbr/Contents/Home/bin:$HOME/Library/Android/sdk/emulator:$HOME/Library/Android/sdk/platform-tools:$PATH" npx expo run:android
scripts.ios: SENTRY_DISABLE_AUTO_UPLOAD=true env -u CI sh -c 'npx expo start --clear & sleep 12 && npx expo run:ios --no-bundler; wait'
scripts.ios:clean: rm -rf ios/build .expo node_modules/.cache $TMPDIR/metro-* $TMPDIR/haste-map-* 2>/dev/null; watchman watch-del-all 2>/dev/null; echo 'Cache cleared. Run: npx expo run:ios'
scripts.ios:uninstall: xcrun simctl uninstall booted com.anonymous.ai-lawyer 2>/dev/null; echo 'App removed from simulator'
scripts.ios:fresh: xcrun simctl uninstall booted com.anonymous.ai-lawyer 2>/dev/null; SENTRY_DISABLE_AUTO_UPLOAD=true env -u CI sh -c 'npx expo start --clear & sleep 12 && npx expo run:ios --no-bundler; wait'
scripts.ios:run: SENTRY_DISABLE_AUTO_UPLOAD=true env -u CI npx expo run:ios --no-bundler
scripts.android:run: REACT_NATIVE_PACKAGER_HOSTNAME=10.0.2.2 env -u CI npx expo run:android --no-bundler
scripts.ios:dev: SENTRY_DISABLE_AUTO_UPLOAD=true env -u CI npx expo run:ios
scripts.ios:live: SENTRY_DISABLE_AUTO_UPLOAD=true env -u CI sh -c 'npx expo start --clear & sleep 8 && npx expo run:ios --no-bundler; wait'
